content:
when whilsteblower is not specified (which it isn't for proposer and attester slashings), then the full amount goes to the proposer.
If the whistleblower is specified (expected to be with some custody game operations), then the amount is split for the whisteblower and some to the proposer for inclusion

tbh, having the conditional whistleblower in there is a bit premature for phase 0, but I think we'll just keep it stable as is
